mean_cn: n.特许（经营权）；公民权；选举权；  v.赋予特权；赋予公民权
mean_en: formal permission given by a company to somebody who wants to sell its goods or services in a particular area; formal permission given by a government to somebody who wants to operate a public service as a business
sentence: I gained the franchise of the restaurant, so I can sell food!
sentence_trans: 我获得了这家餐厅的特许经营权，我可以出售食品啦！
